on

the

when

3. Find and position integers and other rational numbers on a horizontal or vertical number line diagram; find and position pairs of integers and other rational numbers on a coordinate plane.

89EC600FEE58409FADEDF85B60D89EEA.description: Understand that positive and negative numbers are used together to describe quantities having opposite directions or values.

75F2CDEF1F574A679385C93FF1848463.description: Use the distributive property to express a sum of two whole numbers 1-100 with a common factor as a multple of a sum of two whole  numbers with no common factor.

0C8A191998914B16B1280C17E7353CB1.description: Find the greatest common factor of two whole numbers less than or equal to 100 and the least common multiple of two whole numbers less than or equal to 12.

65CD76D2C4B64A958448C72EC685F6D4.description: Fluently add, subtract, multiply, and divide multi-digit decimals using the standard algorithm for each operation.

295E5D60F4034F2F82D4A9084AE48B4D.description: Interpret and compute quotients of fractions, and solve word problems involving division of fractions by fractions.
